title: How to see parameters in stack in x64dbg like in OllyDbg for known API calls?
content:
Based on Detailed API call descriptions not available in x64dbg

When I debug a known API call like for example WSARecv, in OllyDbg I can nicely see the parameters in the stack:

I've installed both plugins: xAnalyzer & APIInfo

But I can't get x64dbg (in this case x32dbg) to show the parameters like Olly:

I tried to right click in CPU window -> xAnalyzer -> Analyze module but didn't make any difference...

Right now I'm using OllyDbg and x32dbg simoultaneusly only because of this... How can I see in x32dbg the parameters like I can see nicely in Olly?

comments.text: Looks like OllyDbg don't die because of this little details :D
